body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Richard Lopez and the customer's name is Dorothy Ward.  The conversation is about a random business (a Shoe Repair Service ) and is a conversation about billing.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! Thank you for calling the Shoe Repair Service. My name is Richard Lopez. How may I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Richard, my name is Dorothy Ward. I'm calling regarding a billing issue.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Dorothy! I’m here to help you with that. Could you please provide me with the order number related to your billing issue?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my order number is one two three four.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for that. And just to verify some information, could you please provide me with your email address?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, my email is dorothy.ward@example.com.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Got it. Now, could you also confirm your phone number for me?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, it’s four zero five - two three one - seven eight nine zero.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Dorothy! I will check your billing details right now.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome! I found the issue and will correct it immediately. Thank you for your time, Dorothy. Have a great day!
